title: What is the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried boy?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried boy: It is one of the things that makes many people feel joy and happiness, but when they see it in dreams, its meaning shows the appearance of many desirable things or that there is another meaning behind it, and through this article we will explain all of that in the following lines to reassure the heart of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried boy. Interpretation of seeing a baby girl in a dream for an unmarried woman is a medical vision that carries a lot of good meanings and signs that will happen in her life, which indicates that she received a lot of good news that makes her forget everything. He was going through difficult days throughout the previous periods. If a girl sees a child in her dream, this is a sign that God will remove from her heart all the worries and sorrows that have dominated her life so much and were the cause of discomfort and security in her life. Seeing the girl also giving birth to a child in her dream is evidence On her ability to get rid of all the problems and crises that stood between her and her dreams and aspirations in the past few days. If the dreamer sees a weak and emaciated child during her sleep, this means that she will face many obstacles and great difficulties that will stand in her way in the coming periods, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a single baby by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing one child in a dream means that she will hear a lot of happy news about her personal life, which will make her very happy. If a girl sees a child in her dream, this is a sign that her husband’s date with a good young man is approaching. He will achieve many things for her that are of great importance to her and make her feel happy and confident. Her life with him. Seeing a girl giving birth to a child during her sleep indicates the big changes that will occur in her life in the coming periods, which will completely change the course of her life for the better. When a girl sees that she is selling a child in a dream, this symbolizes that she will overcome all stages of Her life is difficult and she lives her life in a state of stability by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing a sleeping child in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a sleeping child in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that all worries and problems will leave her life once and for all and that God will give her many blessings and gifts that will make her live. A constant life in which he is. He does not have a strike of any kind. For a girl to see in her dream that she also gave birth to a sleeping child, this is a sign that the date of her marriage to a good young man with whom they will spend their lives together will bring them many great and important successes, either in personal or professional life. Interpretation of a dream about a boy talking To an unmarried woman: Seeing an unmarried woman giving birth to a child speaking in her dream is a sign that she will overcome every obstacle in her life to achieve her big goals and ambitions, which means that they are important and that will be a reason to reach the desired ones. Location: If the dreamer sees a little girl talking in her dream, this means that she lives a happy life in which she does not suffer from problems or problems.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing prison in a dream according to Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of imprisonment in a dream varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Sometimes the dream indicates some wrong actions carried out by the dreamer. There is no doubt that a dream about prison is a frightening dream that causes anxiety and panic for many people when they see prison in a dream. Sometimes a dream indicates wrong actions, and in the following series we will give you, our dear followers, the interpretation of a dream about prison for married women, unmarried girls, pregnant women, and widows. We will also give you the interpretation of a dream about prison for a man, the interpretation of prison in general. See also: Seeing pins in a dream, interpretation of imprisonment in A dream for a married woman. Interpretation of prison in a dream by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq. If a married woman sees sadness in a dream, this vision indicates many blessings and goodness in that woman’s life. The dream of prison also shows her happiness with her husband and children. If a woman sees that the prison door is open, then the vision is a sign On the collapse of worries and the end of all problems and crises in her life. But if a married woman sees herself in prison and is sad, then the dream is a sign that she has committed sins and disobedience in her life, and these sins require her to repent and return to the path of God and the path of truth. See also: Holding a hand A friend in a dream. Interpretation of the imprisonment of an unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl sees a prison in her dream, then this vision is a strong indication that her marriage will be imminent, God Almighty. But if the unmarried girl sees herself being released from prison, then the dream is evidence of that girl’s happiness in her life. And an indication of the good that this girl will receive later. Interpretation of imprisonment of a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of a prison, then this vision is a sign that she will soon give birth and end. Also, seeing a prison is an indication that the next period of the pregnant woman’s life will pass peacefully without any problems, and also that A dream about prison shows goodness and happiness in the life of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she has been released from prison, this is a sign that she will easily give birth, God willing, to a healthy child. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a widow imprisoned. If a widow sees a prison in a dream, the vision will be a sign of kindness. And happiness in life. Seeing a prison in a widow woman’s dream may be a sign of her marriage to a man who has a great status among the people and is wealthy. Interpretation of seeing a prison for a man in a dream: If this man is unmarried and sees a prison in his dream, this is a sign of his marriage to a girl of hers. A high position in her society. But if a married man sees a prison in his dream, this is evidence that he is not happy in this marriage, and that the man has a great responsibility to spend on his family and take care of it. A person who sees that he has released innocence from prison, this is evidence of happiness and goodness in Life. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of prison in a dream by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the dream of prison indicates the many sins and disobedience that a person has committed in his life and his departure from obedience to God and the path of justice and truth. The dream is a warning.

title: What did Ibn Sirin say in interpreting the dream of shaving a child’s hair?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shaving a child’s hair: Children’s hair story is one of the dreams that some people may see and become confused about its interpretation, and their mind will not be at rest until they know the meaning of this dream and whether it is better for it or its opposite, and we clarify these clues in our topic today, referring to what the great dream interpretation scholars have brought. Interpretation of a dream about shaving Hair for the child: The vision has many connotations that differ depending on the condition of the fortuneteller who shaves the child’s hair, so let us learn about the following points: If the child’s hair is shaved immediately after his birth, this is evidence that the one who shaved it is among the people of piety and justice. As for the mother who sees in a dream that her son’s hair is not clean and needs... To the throat, then she should care about her children more than that, and take care of her family’s affairs completely. If a child feels pain in his throat, he may have a disease, but he will recover from it soon. The vision also indicates that this child will not be an ordinary child in the future, but rather a scholar Or a jurist in religion. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a child’s hair by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer suffers from a financially or socially unstable life, then his vision indicates that his circumstances have improved and changed for the better. If a woman sees this vision and suffers from a delay in pregnancy, she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a good child with his parents. But if this child is young and the fortuneteller has shaved her hair, many bad events await her and she must deal with them wisely so as not to get hurt. Interpretation of a dream about a child shaving a child’s hair in a dream for a single woman is one of the good visions in an unmarried woman’s dream, which indicates her desire to get married and sets conditions. Piety and justice for those who propose marriage to her, and she gets what she desires and lives the life she wants in the future. If this child is her sister’s son or sister, then a lot of good will come to that brother or sister, and the girl can be one of the reasons for that good. As for the engaged girl, her vision indicates that the wedding date has been set and that she is very happy in her preparations for the wedding in That period is coming. If a young woman sees herself shaving her head, this is a sign of the arrival of a suitor who has been waiting for her for years and the rejection of many suitors who did not meet the conditions she requested before. However, if his story is about a girl close to her, then she will achieve her ambitions in the field of work and reach the position she seeks and strives for. Among the negatives of seeing someone shaving the hair of a girl he loves is evidence of the hypocrisy of some of those around her and their desire to harm her, and it may ruin her life with her partner. Interpretation A dream about shaving a child’s hair in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a child’s hair in a dream for a married woman. A woman’s vision of shaving her young child’s hair indicates that she will have the ability to live and be in peace after a short period of suffering and bearing life’s burdens and worries. Another positive element of the vision is that it shows that the woman has a heart Her husband and that she gave birth to him many children, which will help and support him in his old age. If the husband has problems in his life that make him constantly busy and thinking about her, he will soon get rid of his problems and he will turn his heart and think about taking care of his family and taking care of them without

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion by senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion: It is one of the dreams that is prevalent among people and contains many symbols and meanings in the dream, some of which may indicate courage and victory, and others express weakness and the inability to overcome or solve the problems facing the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpionSeeing a scorpion in a dream means that There is an enemy of the dreamer in reality, who walks among the people and spreads disorder and a lot of gossip, and he is trying to distort the dreamer’s image. Eating scorpion meat in a dream is an indication of the money that the dreamer will obtain during the coming period from illegal means. Seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes Indicates that during the coming period the dreamer will face an enemy of great power that he must know how to deal with. If the dreamer sees that he is eating snake meat in a dream, this means that he will soon find a job and will be able to earn a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion by Ibn SirinThe dream A scorpion in a dream, which is in the dreamer’s stomach, is evidence that there is someone very close to him, which may be a family or friend, chasing him. A scorpion in a dream and throwing it at a woman, this means that in reality the dreamer is committing a great sin with her, and God will punish him with the harshest punishment. According to According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a snake in a dream is a sign of the strength of the dreamer’s personality and that he has some characteristics in common with the snake. Dreaming of a snake in the dreamer’s house is evidence that there is a person in his house who is conspiring against him and will try to besiege him using some devious methods. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion for a woman For a single girl to see a scorpion in her sleep is a sign that there is someone close to her who is trying to get close to her and he seems innocent, but he is planning and planning to prepare her. A girl who dreams of a snake in her dream is a sign that in the future she will face a major crisis that will make her think a lot about what she can do. Scorpio indicates In a girl’s dream, it indicates that she is committing many sins and transgressions in reality, and she will regret them in the end after people reveal her evil. A snake in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes betrayal and she must be careful of everyone around her, because she can be exposed to severe distress. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion for a married woman: Seeing a Scorpio lady is evidence that she is suffering from many disagreements and problems that already exist between her and her partner and this affects her stability. The Scorpio in a married woman’s dream and burned her, this means that in reality she is carrying a lot of pressure and responsibility on her shoulders. If a married woman sees A snake in her dream means that she suffers from the treatment of others and is not satisfied with that. A married woman chasing a snake outside the house in a dream shows that she is trying with all her might to confront all the problems she faces and stand firm in the face of everything. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a scorpion for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees A scorpion in her dream symbolizes that she is facing some pressures that affect her psychological peace, and this negatively affects the fetus. A snake in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that

title: Interpretation of a dream about coughing and seeing a cough in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of coughing and coughing for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and a single young man, with or without phlegm or snoring, coughing up dead blood, choking and snoring. More than Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Al-Nabul, the interpretation of coughing in a dream. Coughing indicates what illness indicates, and it may foretell annoying things and that someone who wants to hide an action will appear to him. The translator said: A person saw people coughing violently. I said: Many earthquakes happen to people. Another said that there are many earthquakes in the summer, so I said people cough. As for sneezing, it shows relief from the affliction, and as for mucus and spit, if they throw up a lot, they become distressed and distressed, especially if their clothes are dirty. Perhaps spitting shows bad words. The translator said: A man saw that he was spitting on people, so I said: You offend them a lot with bad words. Someone saw that she was blowing hard, so I said: You have a blocked airway and decided to clear it. He told me: Yes. Another saw that there was a lot of mucus in his nose that he could not remove, so I said: You will be out of breath. I understand that. The interpretation of coughing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar and Sheikh Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of coughing in a dream in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams in the chapter on diseases and pains, where he said that the dreamer’s coughing in a dream is an indication of a complaint about him. Someone close to him or an injustice to him. Orgasm, choking due to coughing, and coughing in a dream indicate fears, problems, and troubles that the dreamer falls into. As for someone who sees a person pulling a hair or thread from his mouth after coughing in a dream without cutting a hair or thread, this portends the presence of long-term competition and enmity with others, often over money and inheritance. As for coughing and a merchant’s cough, it is a sign of loss, failure, suffocation, or a feeling of being close to someone. Death due to severe coughing and coughing is a sign of poverty and distress. Interpretation of coughing and coughing in a dream according to Al-NabulsiThe translator, scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, will mention the interpretation of coughing and coughing in a dream in his book “The Perfume of Al-Anam” in the interpretation of dreams, where he did not deviate from what Ibn Sirin mentioned, but rather almost confirmed the same interpretation Where he said that coughing in a dream is a sign of complaints and pain from the injustice, fatigue and oppression that the dreamer is exposed to or the sadness that he is suffering from. Coughing and coughing in the dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried girl and unmarried woman coughing and coughing in a dream is an indication that she feels dissatisfied with herself because Many things that she is going through and doing. The coughing and coughing of an unmarried girl also indicates the instability of her family or her financial circumstances, which means that she has gone through major family disputes and problems, and the difficulties of an unmarried woman towards someone she knows is an indication of differences and problems between them. Coughing and coughing in a dream Married woman: As for a married woman’s coughing in a dream, it reflects the bad psychological state she is experiencing as a result of strong problems and issues she is experiencing, and a married woman’s coughing in a dream portends the death of worries. And problems. Hearing someone you know coughing and coughing in a dream is a sign of misfortune

Interpretation of coughing and coughing in a dream according to Al-NabulsiThe translator, scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, will mention the interpretation of coughing and coughing in a dream in his book “The Perfume of Al-Anam” in the interpretation of dreams, where he did not deviate from what Ibn Sirin mentioned, but rather almost confirmed the same interpretation Where he said that coughing in a dream is a sign of complaints and pain from the injustice, fatigue and oppression that the dreamer is exposed to or the sadness that he is suffering from. Coughing and coughing in the dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried girl and unmarried woman coughing and coughing in a dream is an indication that she feels dissatisfied with herself because Many things that she is going through and doing. The coughing and coughing of an unmarried girl also indicates the instability of her family or her financial circumstances, which means that she has gone through major family disputes and problems, and the difficulties of an unmarried woman towards someone she knows is an indication of differences and problems between them. Coughing and coughing in a dream Married woman: As for a married woman’s coughing in a dream, it reflects the bad psychological state she is experiencing as a result of strong problems and issues she is experiencing, and a married woman’s coughing in a dream portends the death of worries. And problems. Hearing someone you know coughing and coughing in a dream is a sign of misfortune

title: More than 70 interpretations of a dream about a dead person according to Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person: Dreams about a dead person: It is one of the dreams that we often see in our dreams, and this dead man often has a great place in our hearts, and we have felt his loss and loss since the death of God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person. We fear death and the unknown that awaits him after his death, and we may not be the ones who want to think about him, but when we lose someone dear to our hearts, his image often appears before our eyes in dreams and wakefulness. Seeing him awake is evidence of our love for him, but seeing him in a dream has many connotations. It varies according to the details. If a person sees a dead person in a dream and loves him in reality, he comes to him to reassure him of his condition, and relieve him of his sorrows after losing him. As for someone who has died for God, he offers a gift to the Lord, this is a sign of the good that God will give him soon. If a woman sees If a woman who is not married to a dead man provides her with a gift and takes it from him, then she will either find a job or a good husband according to her ambitions in life. Seeing the deceased helping someone in need or doing a good deed in the dreamer’s dream is an temptation for him to do good deeds, which is what remains for him in the afterlife without other deeds. It may Seeing him in a state of anxiety and sadness is for reasons related to the dead person personally and may be linked to the dreamer. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person Our venerable scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dead has many interpretations that come according to the condition of the dead person and the dreamer alike. The dead person who faces God in a dream is as if he were still alive. Alive, and he was in the name of a brilliant person, who will be satisfied with a high position in the afterlife, and secure his place in Paradise (God Almighty willing). God). If you take him to a familiar place, this is good news for the monarch that he will rise in rank, or receive a great reward for his work. As for being transported to an unknown place or desert, it is evidence that the dreamer is in great trouble and he must be careful of those around him. And the beautiful appearance that appears in him The deceased is evidence that he has attained God’s forgiveness, God’s forgiveness for him, and his joy at being rewarded in Paradise. As for his vision of one of the people of knowledge and religion, and God Almighty has died, it is evidence of the path that the dreamer is on. If the dead person becomes angry with the fortuneteller in his dream and tries to hit him, this means that the dreamer is committing a lot. From mistakes and needs to re-examine himself and seek advice from those who have left the world and everything behind it. And they went to their Lord to find the good and the bad of the deeds they had done in their lives. Seeing a dead father or dead mother may be a sign of the dreamer’s negligence in praying for them or his weakness and failure to follow the teachings with which he was raised. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for single peopleIf a girl sees In her dream that there was a person to whom she turned to in many issues related to her life and who died some time ago, her vision may indicate that she is in dire need of this psychological support that she had. . Seeing her father gives her evidence of her lack of connection and protection and her exposure to many problems since his death. But if she had a brother and he died and she hesitated to see him in her dreams as if he were alive, then she will learn from her experiences in life and strengthen her character so that she will not be exploited as she was. the past

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a brown horse in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a brown horse in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a horse is considered one of the most frequently searched visions. This vision carries many connotations that vary based on many factors, including that the color of the horse may be white, black, or brown, and the horse may be gentle and friendly or angry, and it may be slaughtered or die. What is important to us in this article is to mention all the details and special cases. To see a brown horse in a dream, especially for a married woman. Learn about the interpretation of seeing a brown horse in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a brown horse in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a horse in a dream represents dignity, pride, prestige, abundant life, prosperity of circumstances, changing circumstances for the better, prosperity, fertility, succession of good news, good luck, and psychological harmony. This vision also indicates his overcoming difficulties and obstacles, removing worries and sorrows, and the multiplicity of abilities and talents that help him achieve his goals with high precision and achieve many desired victories. Sometimes seeing a horse indicates the presence of a husband. If she sees a horse in her bed, this represents her close relationship with her husband, the climax, the enjoyment of her married life, and the end of many crises that have disturbed her mood. If a married woman sees a brown horse, this indicates genius, achieving desired goals and enjoying many methods that help her solve all Complex issues that stand in her way. This vision is also an indication of acumen and flexibility in dealing with current events, as well as foresight, good management, and measurement of all emergency situations that she may witness in the future. But if she sees horses that are not purebred horses, this indicates her old age, weakness, and heaviness. The world, poverty, and a serious financial crisis deprive her of comfort and balance, and she loses her ability. To continue the path that he recently started. And if you see her getting off the horse, and she is sad, this is an indication that she gave up her position or was fired from her job or regrets a decision she made very rashly, and wasted a lot of efforts in vain. But if the lady sees the horse, it shows the blessings and gifts that God gives it to His servants without giving it much or thanking the Lord for it, and greed for divine blessings and a constant desire for more fills the soul with them. Arrogance and pride. Seeing a brown horse in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a horse represents extraordinary power and strength, luxury, pride, status, and the enjoyment of many powers that help its owner make decisions that suit him and prove his will in difficult situations. If a married woman sees a brown horse In her dream, this indicates the many battles that she fights in her life and enters into many experiments aimed at gaining experiences, profits, and understanding the nature of life and its tribulations. And if she sees herself riding a brown horse, this indicates that there is a degree of confusion and hesitation in some matters that some people take their own opinion. And tension when placed in situations that require a quick response

title: Interpretation of seeing a milkshake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing milk churning in a dream or dream, interpretation of seeing curdled milk in a dream, interpretation of seeing milk in different colors, stirring milk means changing it from a liquid state to a different, solid state, and in the interpretation in order to see milk churning in a dream, we explain the following from During our article on our website, see the different interpretations of this vision. Interpretation of seeing milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing milk in a dream indicates distant and good tidings for the dreamer. Seeing milk in a dream indicates this great reward for the good he does. Dreaming of drinking mare’s milk indicates the interest of the ruler or king. Interpretation Seeing milk in a dream and its effects. Seeing yourself drinking milk in a dream indicates the joy and pleasure of God and his family. Seeing yourself drinking milk in a dream identifies the trip that the dreamer benefited from. Seeing milk in a woman’s dream shows that wonderful food is coming. Seeing milk in a woman’s dream indicates the purity of her heart and the soundness of her intentions. Seeing the buying and selling of milk indicates a profitable and good trade. Dreaming of distributing milk to people as charity, which indicates the dreamer’s blessing in his money and family. Seeing in a dream that he is pouring milk indicates that the viewer will suffer a financial loss. Interpretation of seeing curd in a dream. Seeing curd milk in a dream announces the goodness that will happen. Seeing yourself drinking sour milk in a dream symbolizes a person’s need for help from those around him, but he will not get it. Interpretation of seeing spilled milk in a dream: Seeing spilled milk in a dream indicates exposure to a financial crisis. Seeing spilled milk in a dream for the dreamer may indicate that he has lost his job. Seeing spilled milk in a dream warns the dreamer of losing his religion as a result of wrong actions and he must be careful and repent. Interpretation of seeing milk or yoghurt in a dream. Seeing sour milk in a dream Report the profit that the viewer made from the trip. Seeing sour milk or milkshakes in a dream symbolizes abundance of livelihood and blessing in life. Money. Seeing milk in a dream indicates comfort after hardships and anxiety. Seeing milk with bread in a dream indicates recovery after illness. Seeing milk in a dream and eating it indicates money that is suspicious and not from a completely halal source. Interpretation of seeing milk in different colors in a dream. Seeing black milk in a dream indicates To hide the truth and reveal falsehood. Seeing milk mixed with blood indicates forbidden money. Seeing a change in the color of milk in a dream indicates bad morals and nature. Seeing burnt milk in a dream indicates anger and tension. Interpretation of seeing milk in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing someone drinking milk in a dream states that the dreamer has A new job. Seeing milk in a dream and pouring it on the floor indicates a financial crisis in his life. Seeing a merchant pouring coffee in a dream indicates a huge financial loss for him. Interpretation of seeing him distributing milk in a dream. Seeing him in a dream distributing milk to his acquaintances and neighbors indicates that something bad It happened to him. Seeing a traveler drinking milk in a dream indicates a return to God

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a soldier in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the army in one dreamIf the soldier who appears to the girl is a man or a soldier she knew before, then she will most likely marry him. But if the soldier does not know the unmarried girl in the dream, this indicates that the girl is devoted to her principles and correct ideas. Whoever dreams that he is wearing a military uniform If you see in your dream that he is accepted in tests and in general the army, in the interpretation of the dream it says that you will get what you want from work, success, treatment, or Marriage. As for someone who dreams of being rejected in college or military exams, the dream confirms that the sleeper may not yet be ready to face the problems in his life, and God knows best. As for someone who sees that he is attending a military parade to honor some soldiers, the dream here indicates that the sleeper may receive Honoring in the coming days. Seeing a pregnant woman in military uniform. This dream is considered one of the praiseworthy dreams for a pregnant woman. Wearing a military uniform in a dream indicates that pregnancy and childbirth will be easy and comfortable. The meaning of seeing a military uniform. Whoever sees a soldier in a military uniform in a dream, the interpretation of the dream indicates that the sleeper He can deal with the problems he has gone through now, and he may have the brains or enough money for that. As for the one who sees in the dream the medals that the soldiers receive, in reality they indicate higher studies or prestigious scientific degrees that the sleeper will obtain, and God knows best. As for the one who sees that he is wearing A military uniform, but he has a large collection of weapons. The dream means that the sleeper is unfortunately on the verge of a major life battle, and God knows best. Seeing a dress in a married woman’s dreamThe habit of wearing a military uniform for a married woman is good. If a married woman sees her husband wearing a military uniform, then her husband can get money or... Position or job. However, if a married woman sees that one of her sons is wearing a military uniform, the son will have a great status in the country. Interpretation of seeing a white military uniform. Whoever sees a white military uniform in a dream is a sign of kindness and livelihood, but whoever sees a military uniform in another color, such as yellow or green. The dream indicates that the sleeper will face many severe difficulties. But eventually he will be able to.
